mapper.select: SELECT items.id, items.name, items.category_id AS categoryId, items.amount, items.deadline, items.purchase_date AS purchaseDate, items.others, items.status, categories.name AS categoryName FROM items INNER JOIN categories ON items.category_id = categories.id WHERE items.status <> 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO items( name, category_id, amount, deadline, purchase_date, others, status ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{categoryId}, #{amount}, #{deadline}, #{purchaseDate}, #{others}, #{status} )
